title: Florida executes Richard Barry Randolph, convicted of raping, killing former convenience store manager
text: Florida executed Richard Barry Randolph by lethal injection for a 1988 murder, setting a record with its 17th execution this year under Gov. Ron DeSantis.
summary: Florida executed Richard Barry Randolph by lethal injection for a 1988 murder, setting a record with its 17th execution this year under Gov. Ron DeSantis.
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
